sentences.en: Four teaching principles are the integrity, participatory, interesting and intercommunication principles.
sentences.cn: 生活小百科网:四个教学原则,即整体性 、 参与性 、 趣味性和交际性原则.

sentences.en: It discussed the integration points of participatory approaches and natural forest protection program.
sentences.cn: 探讨了参与式方法与天然林资源保护的结合点.

sentences.en: It mainly included Focus Group Discussion, Participatory Observation, Delphi technique, Personal Interview, Overall Survey and Sampling Survey , Typical Survey, Capture - Mark - Recapture Method, et al.
sentences.cn: 主要包括专题小组讨论, 参与性观察, 德尔菲法, 个体访谈; 普查与抽样调查, 典型调查, 捕获 - 标记 - 再捕获法.

sentences.en: Joint ventures between private companies and local people based on participatory management.
sentences.cn: 在共同参与管理的基础上,可以形成私营企业与当地民众的合资企业.

sentences.en: Last andnot least , as previously mentioned, this course is highly participatory.
sentences.cn: 最后,综上所述, 这是门高度参与性的课程.

sentences.en: Method The village doctors experimental group accepted participatory approach training and group accepted customary training.
sentences.cn: 方法实验组的乡村医生接受参与式培训,对照组按原要求培训.

sentences.en: Participation of poor women and disables were ensured during participatory selection processes.
sentences.cn: 在项目的参与式选举过程中确保了妇女和残疾人的参与.

sentences.en: Participatory approach is truly a practical and effective method for college English teaching.
sentences.cn: “参与式”教学法确实是一种切实可行、且行之有效的大学英语教学方法.

sentences.en: Participatory budgeting and other forms of participatory gover - nance will not deliver instant success.
sentences.cn: 预算分享和其他形式的管理分享并不会带来直接的成功.

sentences.en: Rather the practicum follows a participatory action research model whereby students work hand - in - hand with LCW members.
sentences.cn: 这个实践课程遵循行动分享研究模型,学生们将与劳伦斯社区工作公司成员并肩工作.

sentences.en: Studies have shown that women tend to be more participatory in their management style.
sentences.cn: 研究表明，女性的管理风格往往具有更强的参与式特点。

sentences.en: The participatory nature of Twitterand Facebook also makes them excellent tools supercharging creativity.
sentences.cn: Twitter和 Facebook参与分享的特性也使它们成为优秀的创造力超级充电器.

sentences.en: This course is highly participatory. We have only 13 classes. You need to attend every class.
sentences.cn: 本课程具有很强的参与性. 我们只有十三次课程,你需要参与每一节课.

words.tran_cn: 由多人一起参加的；（股票等）持有人有权分享利益的

phrases.tran_cn: 分享民主制；参与性民主制度

trans.tran_en: a participatory way of organizing something, making decisions etc is one that involves everyone who will be affected
